title: The sparagus garden a comedie. Acted in the yeare 1635. by the then Company of Revels, at Salisbury Court. The author Richard Brome.
author: Brome, Richard, d. 1652?
publisher: Printed by I. Okes, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop in Kings-street at the signe of the Goat, and in Westminster-hall,
notes: Leaf A4r contains prologue only. Variant: A4r contains prologue and epilogue.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
